import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../public/style/components/header.css' import { Row, Col, Menu, Drawer } from 'antd' import Link from 'next/link' import { RadarChartOutlined, AreaChartOutlined, CrownOutlined, PlaySquareOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' const Header = () => { const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false); const [clas, serClas] = useState(0); const showNavDrawer = { true: () => { setVisible(false); serClas(0) }, false: () => { setVisible(true); serClas(1) } } const showDrawer = () => { showNavDrawer[visible](); }; const onClose = () => { showNavDrawer[visible](); setTimeout(() => { setVisible(false); serClas(0) }, 1000) }; return (
